title.narrative: IOM - Strengthening women's resilience as peace actors in Nord and Sahel 2022-25
IOM - Stärka kvinnors motståndskraft som fredsaktörer i Nord och Sahel 2022-2025

description.narrative: Insatsen ämnar stärka kvinnors rolls som fredsaktörer genom att stärka deras kapaciteter, deras socioekonomiska egenmakt och deras deltagande i lokal dialog.
It aims to strengthen the role of women as peace actors by enhancing their capacities, their socio-economic empowerment and their participation in local dialogue.

The overall objective of the proposed intervention is that:
Women (IDPs/Hosts) will be more resilient and will be able to contribute significantly to the consolidation of peace and the strengthening of social cohesion in the North and Sahel regions
This will be achieved by working towards the following results and outputs:
1. Women actively participate in local planning processes and community dialogue on peace and social cohesion in the North and Sahel regions
1.1 the capacities of local government and services are strengthened in the promotion of gender equallity, and mechanisms for the socio-economic inclusion of vulnerable people (IDPs) are reinforced
1.2 Women's leadership in targeted communities is promoted and women act as promoters of peace and protection of vulnerable communities
2. Socio-economic empowerment of women (IDPs/Hosts) is enhanced in the North and Sahel regions through sustainable sources of income
2.1 Women's committees (IDPs/Hosts) improve their socio-economic autonomy and have strengthened capacities in income-generating activities
2.2 Successful initiatives by beneficaries (IDPs/Hosts) are disseminated nationwide

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution

tag.narrative: 1.1 - By 2030, eradicate extreme poverty for all people everywhere, currently measured as people living on less than $1.25 a day.
1.1 - Senast 2030 avskaffa den extrema fattigdomen för alla människor överallt. Med extrem fattigdom avses för närvarande människor som lever på mindre än 1,25 US-dollar per dag.
16.1 - Avsevärt minska alla former av våld och dödligt våld överallt.
16.1 - Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere.
5.5 - Ensure women’s full and effective participation and equal opportunities for leadership at all levels of decision-making in political, economic and public life.
5.5 - Tillförsäkra kvinnor fullt och faktiskt deltagande och lika möjligheter till ledarskap på alla beslutsnivåer i det politiska, ekonomiska och offentliga livet.

8.3 - Främja utvecklingsinriktad politik som stöder produktiv verksamhet, skapande av anständiga arbetstillfällen, företagande, kreativitet och innovation samt uppmuntra att mikroföretag liksom små och medelstora företag växer och blir en del av den formella ekonomin, bland annat genom tillgång till finansiella tjänster.

8.3 - Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.
